description: Raise your arm with your palm forward and fingers point up then pull the fingers back with your other hand for 10 seconds each hand.
Stretch your arm over your chest using the other arm to hold it for 10 seconds on each arm.
With your hands, pull your neck to the right and to the left, staying in position for a few seconds.
With both hand touching the back of your head, move it downards, stretching the back of your neck.
Cross your legs and lower your body with your arms straight down. Repeat the movement switching the legs.
While sitting, open your legs and try to touch the ground with the palms of your hands, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull your knee until it touches your chest and hold, change the leg after 10 seconds.
While sitting, cross one leg and lean your body forward, change the crossed leg after 10 seconds.
While sitting, close your eyes and cover them with your palms for 2 minutes, then open normally.
In an open area, look the farthest away you can in 4 directions for 3 seconds, move only your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area under your eyebrows in circular movements for 15 seconds.
While standing, rotate your hips as much as you can to the left, hold for 5 seconds. Repeat to the right.
